title: The Hunt Continues (feat. Aaron Berg)
description:
midroll- 19:19 
Aaron Berg joins The Bonfire and the guys talk about the new show Adults Adopting Adults, go over Aaron's past sexual encounters & listen to the comments of a predator's mother as he's being caught!

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com
